reviewtext: I have used this model for 8 months and it has plenty of audio and video (including SVideo) inputs.  It can record and play S-VHS and VHS tapes,  with the former providing superior playback using the 2-hours recording  mode and an S-VHS tape.  It auto detects the tape type and has an easy to  use remote.  The best S-VHS machine in this price range.
summary: Great for recording from Satellite Receivers
